DOC.brief_summary: The clinical study compares safety and efficacy of MK0507A (dorzolamide 1.0% / timolol 0.5%) with 1) timolol 0.5% and with 2) concomitant therapy with dorzolamide 1.0% / timolol 0.5% in patients with glaucoma and ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: MK0507A Clinical Study in Patients With Glaucoma and Ocular Hypertension (0507A-149)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients with glaucoma and ocular hypertension History of ocular surgery within 3 months Administration contradiction to timolol and dorzolamide
